metadata.title: CVE-2023-24531 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Command go env is documented as outputting a shell script containing the Goenvironment. However, go env doesn't sanitize values, so executing itsoutput as a shell script can cause various bad bahaviors, includingexecuting arbitrary commands or inserting new environment variables. Thisissue is relatively minor because, in general, if an attacker can setarbitrary environment variables on a system, they have better attackvectors than making "go env" print them out.

criterions.comment: golang-1.13 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
